channel.title: Mission Web3
channel.description: Powered by Galxe, Mission Web3 is the first Web3 course where you can learn about the fundamentals while keeping up with the most recent developments. With a series of carefully curated modules and courses, Mission Web3 invites every curious soul to hop on a journey to the future. This isn’t just learning through educational content but actually building your on-chain resume with the top Web3 projects this industry has to offer. - Powered by RSSHub

item.title: Module 4: DEX
item.description: Welcome to Module 4 of Mission Web3! In this module, we will dive deeper into understanding crypto exchanges— specifically Decentralized Exchanges. Let's get started!

item.title: Module 3: Networks and Tokens
item.description: Now that you’ve mastered the basics of Web3, in this module you’ll gain a deeper understanding of blockchain, cryptocurrency, and tokens. You’ll be ready to explore other Galxe campaigns after this module.

item.title: Module 2: Fund Your Wallet
item.description: New to Web3? We got you covered! We’ll cover all you need to know about setting up and funding your wallet. Everything from tips and tricks to security.

item.title: Module 1: Welcome to Web3
item.description: Congrats on taking the first step to explore Web3! In the first module, you’ll learn the ins and outs of what Web3 is, why it matters, and create your first self-custodial wallet.

item.title: MW3 Module 14: Idle Assets Earning
item.description: Welcome to Module 14 of Mission Web3 where we explain how idle crypto assets can be utilized to generate passive income through various methods.

item.title: Module 13: Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Welcome to Module 13 of Mission Web3 where we break down AI fundamentals and showcase how advanced models like Alva can give you a competitive edge in the dynamic web3 ecosystem.

item.title: Module 12: Web3 Data Analytics
item.description: Welcome to Module 12 of Mission Web3 where we deconstruct the components in web3 data analytics and delve into how you can use Dune to discover alpha.

item.title: Module 11: Airdrops
item.description: Welcome to Module 11 in our Mission Web3 series. Dive into the complex world of airdrops and discover how Galxe Compass simplifies the process.

item.title: Module 10: Liquid Staking
item.description: Welcome to Module 10 of Mission Web3 where we explore the depths of liquid staking and how this tool can help you maximize your DeFi journey. Shoutout to our partner for this course, Lido!

item.title: Module 9: Security
item.description: Welcome to Module 9 of Mission Web3 where we put the key to securing your funds in your hands. Let’s get started!

item.title: Module 8: DAOs
item.description: Welcome to Module 8 of Mission Web3 where we explore the depths of a DAO and how you can get started on the GalxeDAO!

item.title: Module 7: DeFi
item.description: Welcome to Module 7 of Mission Web3! You will learn everything about DeFi in this module and complete your first DeFi transaction on Aerodrome!

item.title: Module 6: NFTs
item.description: Welcome to Module 6 of Mission Web3! In this module, we will dive deeper into understanding NFTs. Let's get started!

item.title: Module 5: Bridges
item.description: Welcome to Module 5 of Mission Web3! In this module, we will dive deeper into understanding Bridging in Web3 and what it means. Let's get started!
